alert.note: Alert for Crook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 6:10PM PDT until May 20 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Crook County in central Oregon... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 609 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Post, or 12 miles southeast of Prineville, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prineville and Post. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
